msg: Simplify Javascript component reference API a bit. Rename tuscany-ref.js to ref.js. Add a function to declare reference proxy methods.

author: bodewig
msg: use jvmarg support to increase memory for james-server

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-2671 Coordinations which are still active when the Coordinator
service is ungotten must be failed

author: fmeschbe
msg: Use target of "jsr14" for compilation with the following effects:
- Source level 5 indicates support for generics
- Target jsr14 compiles JDK 14 (Class version 48) classes
- Take care to not use other Java 5 features like Annotations and Enum
(Thus replace enum State with plain old int constants)
